job_tasks.phrase: You can build web applications autonomously from scratch.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of developing applications independently.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of development responsibilities within a team context and implies ownership of the full development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration within a team structure to understand and contribute to existing systems, a common software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building 'Gen AI solutions', which falls under the development of AI models and applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating modular and reusable software components, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a collaborative coding practice aimed at problem-solving.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the full software development lifecycle from building to running, with an emphasis on quality and scalability, specifically for Gen AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to automating development and operational tasks, which is a core MLOps/DevOps responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration and learning from others to achieve collective improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.
soft_skills.justification: Pair programming is a direct form of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions receiving help and improving together, indicating collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You can build web applications autonomously from scratch.
soft_skills.justification: Building autonomously implies taking ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Having end-to-end responsibility signifies ownership of the solutions.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as building, testing, deploying, and running scalable web applications ('build web applications autonomously from scratch', 'Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions', 'Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks'). While it mentions 'Gen AI solutions', the core responsibilities and the title 'Junior Full Stack Engineer' point towards integrating these solutions into broader applications rather than specializing in model development or fine-tuning. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration) with a clear application of GenAI within that context.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering responsibilities and mentions GenAI as the domain of application. However, it lacks specific details on the AI/ML tasks themselves, making it lean towards an AI-adjacent role rather than a core AI/ML role. The confidence is high for the classification of tasks but moderate for definitively excluding a deeper AI specialization without more explicit AI-centric task descriptions.
